chunk_00001.caption:
### **SCENE SETTING:**
Central Perk coffee shop — evening, warm ambient lighting with decorative lamps and bar area visible.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**
Rachel Green: dark-colored cardigan - patterned skirt - dark, shoulder-length hair tied up - expression: focused, slightly concerned
Monica Geller: dark-colored top - dark pants - dark, wavy hair - expression: animated, engaged in conversation
Joey Tribbiani: dark-colored shirt - dark pants - dark, medium-length hair - expression: relaxed, smiling
Chandler Bing: light-colored shirt - dark pants - brown, medium-length hair - expression: amused, smirking
Phoebe Buffay: light-colored top - dark pants - blonde, shoulder-length hair - expression: animated, laughing
Ross Geller: dark-colored shirt - dark pants - brown, short hair - expression: serious, listening

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Rachel walks through the coffee shop carrying a tray with coffee mugs, interacting with customers and staff. Monica sits on the orange couch, holding a yellow mug and listening to Rachel. Joey sits at a table, smiling and looking at Monica. Chandler leans back in his chair, smirking at the conversation. Phoebe stands near the counter, laughing and gesturing. Ross stands near the bar, listening to the conversation.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Coffee mugs: various colors (on tray and table)
- Orange couch (center of frame)
- Wooden table (with mugs and plates)
- Bar stools (near counter)
- Decorative lamps (on tables)
- Menu board (behind counter)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Rachel discusses coffee orders with the barista. The conversation has a casual tone, with Rachel appearing focused and Monica animated. Joey and Chandler react with amusement, while Ross listens seriously.

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
Rachel walks from the counter to the couch area.
Monica sits down on the couch.
Joey sets down his mug on the table.
Phoebe moves from the counter to stand near the couch.
chunk_00001.subtitles: Coffee. - Thank you. - Cappuccino. [SPEAKING IN ITALIAN] And a nice hot cider for Monica. Aw, thank you. - Rach? - Yeah? Why does my cinnamon stick have an eraser? Oh. Oh, heh. That's why. Sorry.

chunk_00002.subtitles: TEDLOCK: Chandler? Miss Tedlock, you're looking lovely today. May I say that is a very flattering sleeve length on you? Yes. Well, Mr. Costilick would like you to stop by his office at the end of the day. Oh, listen, if this is about those prank memos, I had nothing to do with them. Really, nothing at all. Really. Nothing. Hey, you guys. You guys. Chandler's coming, and he says he has this incredible news. So when he gets here, let's all act like, you know... - Hey. GROUP: Hey.

Ross Geller: blue sweater - dark pants - short, dark hair - animated, gesturing
Phoebe Buffay: dark top - dark pants - long, dark hair - concerned, then smiling
Joey Tribbiani: dark jacket - dark pants - short, dark hair - relaxed, smiling

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Rachel Green stands and gestures while speaking, then sits on the couch. Monica Geller sits beside her, listening and reacting. Chandler Bing stands near the couch, speaking and gesturing. Ross Geller sits at a table, gesturing as he speaks. Phoebe Buffay sits on the couch, listening. Joey Tribbiani sits at a table, smiling.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Coffee mugs: various colors (on tables)
- Orange couch (center of frame)
- Wooden tables (with mugs and books)
- Bar stools (at counter)
- Neon signs (on wall)
- Flower arrangement (on table)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Rachel Green discusses her job promotion and decision to quit with the group. The conversation has a casual tone, with Rachel appearing excited and Monica concerned. Chandler Bing listens and responds with a serious expression, while Ross Geller gestures animatedly. The group reacts with surprise and concern.

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
Rachel Green stands up and walks to the couch.
Chandler Bing stands up and walks toward the couch.
Ross Geller gestures with his hands while speaking.
Monica Geller smiles and nods while listening.
chunk_00003.subtitles: - Hey. GROUP: Hey. Never mind. But it was gonna be really good. ROSS: What's going on? RACHEL: What's up? It's a typical day at work. I'm inputting my numbers... ...and Big Al calls me into his office... ...and tells me he wants to make me processing supervisor. - That is great! - Congratulations. So I quit. BOTH: Why? Why? This was supposed to be a temp job. Yeah, Chandler, you've been there for five years. I know, but if I took it this... ...it'd be like admitting that this is what I actually do. So was it a lot more money? Doesn't matter. I just don't want to be one of those guys... ...that's in his office until 12:00 at night worrying about the WENUS. "The WENUS"? Weekly estimated net usage system. It's a processing term. Oh, that WENUS. So, what are you gonna do? I don't know. That's the thing. I don't know. I'm not gonna figure it out working there. Oh! I have something you can do. I have this new massage client. Steve.

chunk_00004.subtitles: I have this new massage client. Steve. Anyway, um, he's opening up a restaurant... ...and he's looking for a head chef. Um, hi there. Hi. Oh, yeah, I know. You're a chef, I know, and I thought of you first. But, um, Chandler's the one who needs a job right now, so... Yeah, I just don't have a lot of chefing experience. Unless it's an all-toast restaurant. - Yeah. Yeah. - Well, what kind of food is he looking for? He wants to do something eclectic, so he's looking for someone... ...who can, you know, create the entire menu. - Oh, my God. - Yeah, I know. So, what do you think? Thanks, Pheeb. I just don't really see myself in a big white hat. Okay. Oh, Monica. Guess what?

Ross Geller: dark red sweater - light-colored pants - short, dark hair - expression concerned, then smiling
Phoebe Buffay: dark patterned top - long, blonde hair - expression smiling, then animated
Joey Tribbiani: dark shirt - short, dark hair - expression relaxed, smiling
Monica Geller: dark-colored sweater - dark pants - dark, shoulder-length hair - expression serious, then animated

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Chandler stands in the kitchen area, gesturing animatedly while speaking to the group. Rachel stands near the table holding a mug, listening and reacting. Ross and Phoebe sit on the couch, watching the conversation. Monica enters from the kitchen holding a water bottle and speaks to Rachel. Joey is seated at the table, smiling and listening.

- Water bottle: clear plastic (held by Monica)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Chandler discusses his career counseling appointment with the group, expressing uncertainty about his future. Rachel and Monica react with concern and amusement. The conversation has a casual, slightly humorous tone, with Chandler appearing earnest and Rachel animatedly responding. Ross and Phoebe listen with expressions of concern and amusement.

chunk_00005.subtitles: Can you see my nipples through this shirt? No, but don't worry. I'm sure they're still there. Where you going, Mr. Suit-ey Man? Well, I have an appointment to see Dr. Robert Pilman... ...career counselor-a-go-go. I added the "a-go-go." Career counselor? Hey, you guys all know what you want to do. I don't. Hey, you guys in the living room all know what you want to do. You know, you have goals. You have dreams. I don't have a dream. Ah, the lesser known "I Don't Have a Dream" speech. Oh, I love my life. I love my life. Brian's Song. The meeting with that guy went great? So great. He showed me where the restaurant's gonna be. It's this cute little place on 10th Street. It's not too big, not too small. It's just right. Was it formerly owned by a blond woman and some bears?

chunk_00006.subtitles: Was it formerly owned by a blond woman and some bears? So anyway, I'm cooking dinner for him Monday night. Kind of like an audition. And Phoebe, he really wants you to be here, which will be great for me. Because you can make yummy noises. - What are you gonna make? - Yummy noises. And, Monica, what are you gonna make? I don't know. I don't know. It's just gotta be so great. Oh! I know what you can make. I know. Oh, you should make that thing, you know, with the stuff. You know that thing with the stuff? Okay, I don't know. Hey, guys, anyone know a good date place in the neighborhood? Uh, how about Tony's? If you can finish a 32-ounce steak, it's free. Okay. Ahem. Hey, does anyone know a good place if you're not dating a puma? - Who are you going out with? - Oh, is this the bug lady? [AS BUG LADY] I love you, Ross. Her name is Celia. She's not a bug lady.

chunk_00007.subtitles: Her name is Celia. She's not a bug lady. She's curator of insects at the museum. So, what are you guys gonna do? Well, I just thought we'd go to dinner, then bring her back to my place... ...and I'd introduce her to my monkey. And he's not speaking metaphorically. - So back to your place? - Uh-huh. You thinking maybe, heh-heh? Ahem, well, I don't know, heh-heh. I'm hoping heh-heh. I'm telling you, that monkey's a chick magnet. She's gonna one look at his furry, cute little face and it'll seal the deal. - Aah! ROSS: Celia, don't worry. Celia, he's not gonna hurt you. Soothing tones, Celia, soothing tones. - Okay, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. - Aah! - Here, here. Marcel? Marcel? - I can't stand this. - He's got his claws on my... - Yeah, all right.

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**

Ross Geller: dark-colored sweater - dark pants - dark, short hair - concerned
Rachel Green: dark top - jeans - brown, shoulder-length hair - serious
Chandler Bing: light-colored shirt - dark pants - brown, medium-length hair - serious
Phoebe Buffay: dark top - jeans - dark, shoulder-length hair - concerned
Joey Tribbiani: white shirt - dark pants - brown, medium-length hair - serious

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Monica stands in the kitchen area, holding a wooden spoon and talking to Ross, who is seated at the table. Rachel sits across from Ross, looking at an open book. Chandler enters from the doorway holding a stack of papers, walks toward the group, and stands near the table. Joey enters from the doorway, holding a stack of papers, and stands near the table. Ross looks up at Monica as she speaks, then looks at Chandler as he enters. Rachel gestures with her hands while speaking to Chandler. Monica gestures with the spoon while talking to Ross. Chandler looks down at the papers he is holding. Joey looks at the group as he stands near the table.

- Wooden table (center of frame)
- White refrigerator (with magnets and photos)
- Blue kitchen cabinets (background)
- Lamp (on side table)
- Book (open on table)
- Wooden spoon (held by Monica)
- Stack of papers (held by Chandler and Joey)
- Flower arrangement (in vase on counter)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Monica discusses a salmon mousse recipe with Ross, who is skeptical about the dish. Chandler and Joey enter the room holding stacks of papers, and Rachel begins talking to Chandler about something. The conversation has a casual tone, with Monica appearing animated and Ross looking concerned. Chandler and Joey appear serious as they listen to the conversation.

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
Chandler enters from the doorway and walks toward the table
Joey enters from the doorway holding papers and stands near the table
Ross looks up from the table to Monica as she speaks
Rachel gestures with her hands while speaking to Chandler
Monica gestures with the wooden spoon while talking to Ross
chunk_00008.subtitles: Okay, try this salmon mousse. - Mm. Good. MONICA: Yeah? Is it better than the other salmon mousse? It's creamier. Yeah? Well, is that better? I don't know. We're talking about whipped fish, Monica. I'm just happy I'm keeping it down, you know? God, what happened to you? Eight and a half hours of aptitude tests... ...intelligence tests, personality tests, and what do I learn? "You're ideally suited for a career in data processing... ...for a large multi-national corporation." That's so great, because you already know how to do that. Can you believe it? Don't I seem like somebody who should be doing something really cool? You know, I just always pictured myself doing something...

chunk_00009.subtitles: You know, I just always pictured myself doing something... Something. Oh, Chandler, I know, I know. Oh, hey, you can see your nipples through this shirt. [INAUDIBLE DIALOGUE] Here you go. Maybe this will cheer you up. Ooh, you know, um, I had a grape about five hours ago... ...so I better split this with you. It's supposed to be that small. It's a pre-appetizer. The French call it an amuse-bouche. Well, it is amusing. [PHONE RINGS] Hello? Oh, hi, Wendy. Yeah, 8:00. What did we say? Ten dollars an hour? Okay, great. All right, I'll see you then. Bye. Ten dollars an hour for what? I asked a waitress at work to help me out. Waitressing? Uh-oh.

chunk_00011.subtitles: Okay, uh, ahem, a weird thing happened to me on the train this morning... No, no, no. Talk dirty. - Wow. Here? - Come on. Come on. You know, but it wasn't a total loss. I mean, uh, we ended up cuddling. Whoa, you cuddled? How many times? Shut up. It was nice. I just... I just don't think I'm the dirty-talking kind of guy, you know?
